Field.name: MeasurementAttributeCode
Field.comment: Code used to express an attribute response when a numeric measurement value cannot be determined

Field.name: NonconformanceDeterminationCode
Field.comment: Code indicating whether a nonconforming condition was the reason for submitting or the basis upon which a nonconformance report is initiated

Field.name: AssignedIdentification
Field.comment: Alphanumeric characters assigned for differentiation within a transaction set

Field.name: ProductProcessCharacteristicCode
Field.comment: Code identifying the general class of a product or process characteristic

Field.name: AgencyQualifierCode
Field.comment: Code identifying the agency assigning the code values

Field.name: ProductDescriptionCode
Field.comment: A code from an industry code list which provides specific data about a product characteristic

Field.name: Description
Field.comment: A free-form description to clarify the related data elements and their content

SyntaxNote.name: R0102
SyntaxNote.comment: At least one of NCD01 or NCD02 is required.
